price: Pero en cambio, quienes hayan creído y obrado rectamente serán los moradores del Paraíso donde vivirán eternamente.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
